channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ School of Computer Science, Fudan University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Denoising Diffusion Path: Attribution Noise Reduction with An Auxiliary Diffusion Model
item.description: Denoising Diffusion Path (DDPath) uses diffusion models to dramatically reduce noise in attribution methods for deep neural networks, leading to clearer explanations and improved quantitative results.

item.title: DeTrack: In-model Latent Denoising Learning for Visual Object Tracking
item.description: DeTrack revolutionizes visual object tracking with an in-model latent denoising learning process, achieving real-time speed and state-of-the-art accuracy.

item.title: Faster Local Solvers for Graph Diffusion Equations
item.description: Revolutionizing graph analysis, this paper introduces a novel framework for efficiently solving graph diffusion equations, achieving up to a hundred-fold speed improvement and enabling faster graph ne…

item.title: Improving Viewpoint-Independent Object-Centric Representations through Active Viewpoint Selection
item.description: Active Viewpoint Selection (AVS) significantly improves viewpoint-independent object-centric representations by actively selecting the most informative viewpoints for each scene, leading to better seg…
